snippet: Maryland is likely to become the 18th state to outlaw executions after lawmakers approved a measure abolishing the death penalty.
abstract: Maryland is likely to become 18th state to outlaw executions after lawmakers approve measure abolishing the death penalty.
lead_paragraph: Maryland is likely to become the 18th state to outlaw executions after lawmakers approved a measure abolishing the death penalty.

headline.seo: Maryland: Repeal of Death Penalty Awaits Governor’s Signature
headline.main: Maryland: Repeal of Death Penalty Awaits Governor’s Signature
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Repeal of Death Penalty Awaits the Governor’s Signature
